timezoneParams.option: GMT(London, Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, Casablanca, Monrovia)
GMT+1:00 (Paris,Amsterdam, Berlin, Rome, Vienna, Madrid, Warsaw, Brussels)
GMT+2:00 (Israel, Cairo, Athens, Helsinki, Istanbul, Buchrest)
GMT+8:00 (Beijing, Singapore, Taipei, Kuala Lumpur, Irkutsk, Perth)
GMT+10:00 (Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Canberra, Guam, Hobart)

device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <polycomConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="polycomConfig.xsd">
<call call.callsPerLineKey="24" call.parkedCallRetrieveMethod="legacy" call.parkedCallRetrieveString="" call.directedCallPickupMethod="native" call.directedCallPickupString1=""> </call>
<feature> <feature.callPark feature.callPark.enabled="1"/> <feature.directedCallPickup feature.directedCallPickup.enabled="1"/> <feature.urlDialing feature.urlDialing.enabled="0"/> </feature>
<!-- Registration Settings --> <reg reg.1.telephony="1" reg.1.server.1.register="1" reg.1.server.1.address="%%pbx_ip%%" reg.1.server.1.port="%%param::sipport%%" reg.1.outboundProxy.address="%%pbx_ip%%" reg.1.outboundProxy.port="%%param::sipport%%"
reg.1.useCompleteUriForRetrieve="1" reg.1.useLocalTargetUriForLegacyPickup="1" reg.1.server.1.expires="120" reg.1.server.1.expires.lineSeize="30" reg.1.server.1.expires.overlap="60" reg.1.server.1.retryMaxCount="3" reg.1.server.1.retryTimeOut="0"
reg.1.address="%%extension_number%%" reg.1.auth.password="%%extension_auth_pw%%" reg.1.auth.userId="%%extension_auth_id%%" reg.1.label="Ext: %%extension_number%%" reg.1.displayName="%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
reg.1.ringType="default"
reg.1.lineKeys="1" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP320="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP321="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP330="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP331="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP335="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP450="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP550="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP560="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP650="2" reg.1.lineKeys.SPIP670="2"> </reg>
<!-- Subscribe to VM System --> <msg.mwi msg.bypassInstantMessage="1" msg.mwi.1.subscribe="%%extension_number%%" msg.mwi.1.callBackMode="contact" msg.mwi.1.callBack="%%vm_number%%" />
<voice.codecPref %%codec1%% %%codec2%% %%codec3%% %%codec4%% voice.codecPref.G719.32kbps="" voice.codecPref.G719.48kbps="" voice.codecPref.G719.64kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221.16kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221.24kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221.32kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221_C.24kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221_C.32kbps="" voice.codecPref.G7221_C.48kbps="" voice.codecPref.iLBC.13_33kbps="" voice.codecPref.iLBC.15_2kbps="" voice.codecPref.Lin16.8ksps="" voice.codecPref.Lin16.16ksps="" voice.codecPref.Lin16.32ksps="" voice.codecPref.Lin16.44_1ksps="" voice.codecPref.Lin16.48ksps="" voice.codecPref.Siren14.24kbps="" voice.codecPref.Siren14.32kbps="" voice.codecPref.Siren14.48kbps="" voice.codecPref.Siren14.64kbps="" />
<voice.volume voice.volume.persist.handset="1" voice.volume.persist.headset="1" voice.volume.persist.handsfree="1" />
<voIpProt.SIP voIpProt.SIP.allowTransferOnProceeding="0" voIpProt.SIP.use486forReject="1" voIpProt.SIP.specialEvent.checkSync.alwaysReboot="1" />
<!-- Langauge Settings and Clock Format --> <lcl> <lcl.ml lcl.ml.lang="%%langwebUI%%"> <lcl.ml.lang lcl.ml.lang.list="All" lcl.ml.lang.list.SPIP235T="1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19" lcl.ml.lang.list.SPIP321="1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19" lcl.ml.lang.list.SPIP331="1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19" lcl.ml.lang.list.SPIP335="1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19"> <lcl.ml.lang.menu lcl.ml.lang.menu.1="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Chinese_China" lcl.ml.lang.menu.1.label="简体中文 (zh-cn)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.2="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Danish_Denmark" lcl.ml.lang.menu.2.label="Dansk (da-dk)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.3="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Dutch_Netherlands" lcl.ml.lang.menu.3.label="Nederlands (nl-nl)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.4="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/English_Canada" lcl.ml.lang.menu.4.label="English (en-ca)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.5="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/English_United_Kingdom" lcl.ml.lang.menu.5.label="English (en-gb)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.6="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/English_United_States" lcl.ml.lang.menu.6.label="English (en-us)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.7="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/French_France" lcl.ml.lang.menu.7.label="Français (fr-fr)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.8="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/German_Germany" lcl.ml.lang.menu.8.label="Deutsch (de-de)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.9="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Italian_Italy" lcl.ml.lang.menu.9.label="Italiano (it-it)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.10="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Japanese_Japan" lcl.ml.lang.menu.10.label="日本語 (ja-jp)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.11="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Korean_Korea" lcl.ml.lang.menu.11.label="한국어 (ko-kr)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.12="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Norwegian_Norway" lcl.ml.lang.menu.12.label="Norsk (no-no)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.13="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Polish_Poland" lcl.ml.lang.menu.13.label="Polski (pl-pl)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.14="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Portuguese_Portugal" lcl.ml.lang.menu.14.label="Português (pt-br)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.15="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Russian_Russia" lcl.ml.lang.menu.15.label="Русский (ru-ru)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.16="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Slovenian_Slovenia" lcl.ml.lang.menu.16.label="Slovenski (sl-si)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.17="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Spanish_Spain" lcl.ml.lang.menu.17.label="Español (es-es)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.18="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Swedish_Sweden" lcl.ml.lang.menu.18.label="Svenska (sv-se)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.19="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Chinese_Taiwan" lcl.ml.lang.menu.19.label="繁體中文 (zh-tw)" lcl.ml.lang.menu.20="../firmware/polycom/SoundPointIPLocalization/Arabic_AE" lcl.ml.lang.menu.20.label="العربية (ar-ae)"/> <lcl.ml.lang.font lcl.ml.lang.font.1="" lcl.ml.lang.font.2=""> </lcl.ml.lang.font> </lcl.ml.lang> </lcl.ml> </lcl>
<!-- NTP and DST Settings --> <tcpIpApp> <tcpIpApp.sntp lcl.datetime.time.24HourClock="1" tcpIpApp.sntp.address="%%param::time_ntp_server%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.AQuery="0" tcpIpApp.sntp.gmtOffset="%%param::time_utc_offset_seconds%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.resyncPeriod="86400"> <tcpIpApp.sntp.address tcpIpApp.sntp.address.overrideDHCP="0"/> <tcpIpApp.sntp.gmtOffset tcpIpApp.sntp.gmtOffset.overrideDHCP="0"/> <tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.enable="%%dstEnableDisable%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.fixedDayEnable="1"> <tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.date="%%param::time_dst_start_day%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.dayOfWeek="1" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.month="%%param::time_dst_start_month%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.time="%%param::time_dst_start_hour%%"> <tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.dayOfWeek tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start.dayOfWeek.lastInMonth="0"/> </tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.start> <tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.date="%%param::time_dst_end_day%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.dayOfWeek="1" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.month="%%param::time_dst_end_month%%" tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.time="%%param::time_dst_end_hour%%"> <tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.dayOfWeek tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop.dayOfWeek.lastInMonth="0"/> </tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings.stop> </tcpIpApp.sntp.daylightSavings> </tcpIpApp.sntp> </tcpIpApp>
<!-- Logo Background--> <bg {IF ua=SPIP_450} bg.hiRes.gray.selection="3,1" bg.medRes.gray.selection="3,1" bg.hiRes.gray.bm.1.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/Palm256x116.jpg" bg.medRes.gray.bm.1.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/Palm256x116.jpg" {ENDIF}
{IF ua=SPIP_550} bg.hiRes.gray.selection="3,1" bg.hiRes.gray.bm.1.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/polycomspip550.jpg" bg.hiRes.gray.bm.1.em.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/polycomspip550EM.jpg" {ENDIF}
{IF ua=SPIP_650} bg.hiRes.gray.selection="3,1" bg.hiRes.gray.bm.1.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/polycomspip550.jpg" bg.hiRes.gray.bm.1.em.name="%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/polycomspip550EM.jpg" {ENDIF}
/>
<!-- Auto. Frwd if no Answer--> <divert> <noanswer divert.noanswer.1.enabled="0"/> </divert>
<!-- Dial Plan settings--> <dialplan dialplan.digitmap="" dialplan.digitmap.timeout="" dialplan.1.digitmap="" dialplan.1.digitmap.timeout="" />
<se se.rt.custom1.name="3CX Auto Answer" se.rt.custom1.ringer="default" se.rt.custom1.type="answer" />
<!-- voIpProt.SIP.alertInfo.2 intentionally not used --> <voIpProt.SIP.alertInfo voIpProt.SIP.alertInfo.1.class="custom1" voIpProt.SIP.alertInfo.1.value="auto-answer" />
<!-- Distingtive Ring Tone & Voice Mail Sound--> <se> <se.pat> <se.pat.misc> <se.pat.misc.messageWaiting> <se.pat.misc.messageWaiting.inst se.pat.misc.messageWaiting.inst.1.value="0"/> </se.pat.misc.messageWaiting> </se.pat.misc> </se.pat>
</se>
<!-- Admin Password --> <device device.set="1"/> <auth device.auth.localAdminPassword.set="1" device.auth.localAdminPassword="%%DESKPHONE_PASSWORD%%"/> <!-- <auth device.auth.localAdminPassword.set="1" device.auth.localAdminPassword="%%DESKPHONE_PASSWORD%%"/> -->
<!-- BLF Setup--> <attendant attendant.reg="1" attendant.ringType="ringer1" attendant.uri=""> <attendant.behaviors> <attendant.behaviors.display> <attendant.behaviors.display.remoteCallerID attendant.behaviors.display.remoteCallerID.automata="1" attendant.behaviors.display.remoteCallerID.normal="1"/> <attendant.behaviors.display.spontaneousCallAppearances attendant.behaviors.display.spontaneousCallAppearances.automata="0" attendant.behaviors.display.spontaneousCallAppearances.normal="1"/> </attendant.behaviors.display> </attendant.behaviors> {IF blf1} <attendant attendant.resourceList.1.address="%%blf1%%" attendant.resourceList.1.label="%%blffirstname1%% %%blflastname1%%" attendant.resourceList.1.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.1.address="" attendant.resourceList.1.label="" attendant.resourceList.1.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf2} <attendant attendant.resourceList.2.address="%%blf2%%" attendant.resourceList.2.label="%%blffirstname2%% %%blflastname2%%" attendant.resourceList.2.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.2.address="" attendant.resourceList.2.label="" attendant.resourceList.2.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf3} <attendant attendant.resourceList.3.address="%%blf3%%" attendant.resourceList.3.label="%%blffirstname3%% %%blflastname3%%" attendant.resourceList.3.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.3.address="" attendant.resourceList.3.label="" attendant.resourceList.3.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf4} <attendant attendant.resourceList.4.address="%%blf4%%" attendant.resourceList.4.label="%%blffirstname4%% %%blflastname4%%" attendant.resourceList.4.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.4.address="" attendant.resourceList.4.label="" attendant.resourceList.4.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf5} <attendant attendant.resourceList.5.address="%%blf5%%" attendant.resourceList.5.label="%%blffirstname5%% %%blflastname5%%" attendant.resourceList.5.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.5.address="" attendant.resourceList.5.label="" attendant.resourceList.5.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf6} <attendant attendant.resourceList.6.address="%%blf6%%" attendant.resourceList.6.label="%%blffirstname6%% %%blflastname6%%" attendant.resourceList.6.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.6.address="" attendant.resourceList.6.label="" attendant.resourceList.6.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf7} <attendant attendant.resourceList.7.address="%%blf7%%" attendant.resourceList.7.label="%%blffirstname7%% %%blflastname7%%" attendant.resourceList.7.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.7.address="" attendant.resourceList.7.label="" attendant.resourceList.7.type=""/> {ENDIF}
{IF blf8} <attendant attendant.resourceList.8.address="%%blf8%%" attendant.resourceList.8.label="%%blffirstname8%% %%blflastname8%%" attendant.resourceList.8.type="automata"/> {ELSE} <attendant attendant.resourceList.8.address="" attendant.resourceList.8.label="" attendant.resourceList.8.type=""/> {ENDIF}
